attributes.action: Keep legal self-isolation until all children over 5 have been offered a vaccine.
attributes.additional_details: While the risk to children of severe illness or death from Covid-19 is relatively low, they may still experience long Covid after an infection as well as the small risk of paediatric inflammatory multisystem syndrome. Our children should be afforded a chance to receive protection before we completely remove the final remaining Covid-19 restrictions.
attributes.background: All children above the age of 5 should be offered a free vaccine to protect them against Covid-19 before the legal requirement to self-isolate if Covid positive is removed.

rejection.details: Your petition appears to be mainly about offering vaccination against covid-19 to children, so you may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601680
